channel.title: Npc respawn time
channel.description: Okay, i know how to change the respawn time for a npc in npchandler.class (java). But, if i put like, 50000, it will still spawn in like, 10 seconds? So, how do i get it, to where the respawntime declared in npchandler.java, actually works? lol. Thanks.

item.title: Npc respawn time
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“pkufast, post:1, topic:432937”]Okay, i know how to change the respawn time for a npc in npchandler.class (java).
But, if i put like, 50000, it will still spawn in like, 10 seconds? So, how do i get it, to where the respawntime declared in npchandler.java, actually works? lol. Thanks.[/quote]

Make sure you have the correct id. Play around with different npcs and try to determine which ones aren’t cooperating.

Read full topic
